events.name: Minnesota Wild at New York Rangers

headlines.description: — Danila Yurov scored the tiebreaking goal midway through the third period, and the Minnesota Wild beat the New York Rangers 2-1 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Yurov scores tiebreaking goal in 3rd period for first NHL goal as Wild beat Rangers 3-1

headlines.description: — Owen Tippett scored twice and the Philadelphia Flyers beat the Seattle Kraken 5-2 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Tippett scores two goals as Flyers beat Kraken 5-2

headlines.description: — Lane Hutson, Juraj Slafkovsky and Jake Evans scored in the third period, helping the Montreal Canadiens beat the Buffalo Sabres 4-2 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Slafkovsky scores in the 3rd period as the Canadiens beat the Sabres 4-2

headlines.description: — Mark Scheifele and Jonathan Toews scored in the third period, and the Winnipeg Jets beat the Calgary Flames 2-1 on Monday night for their fifth consecutive victory.
headlines.shortLinkText: Scheifele and Toews rally the Jets over the slumping Flames 2-1

events.name: Carolina Hurricanes at Vegas Golden Knights

headlines.description: — Ivan Barbashev had a goal and an assist, and the Vegas Golden Knights beat the Carolina Hurricanes 4-1 on Monday night.
headlines.shortLinkText: Barbashev has goal and assist as Golden Knights beat Hurricanes 4-1
